rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral verbs ('had also died', 'had died', 'said') without high-potency framing.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports subsequent deaths but contains no explicit calming language or cues.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment reports deaths, not a negation.
Factual report of deaths, not capability or preparedness.
'16 laying hens had also died and... three geese, three peacocks and one duck had died too' reports numerical metrics (deaths) using a standard verb ('died').
